text: Ran Pethani railway station (, ) is located in Ran Pethani village, in Thatta district of Sindh province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways * Ran Pethani Railway Bridge Category:Railway stations in Thatta District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Ran Pethani railway station
